meanings: insist, persist, stick to, adhere to, cling to

vlive.korean: 약간 고집이 센 사람인가요? A person who is stern? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
무슨 고집인가... What stubbornness is it... 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : [Replay] Hidden Track No.V 아이콘 X 새소년 X O.O.O 체크인라이브
고집이 원래 되게 세요. he's really stubborn. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [독점] "그남자 작사, 그남자 작곡"...백호와 범주의 못다한 이야기 (프로듀서 인터뷰 비하인드)
고장, 고집, 고통. Malfunction, obstinacy, pain. 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95] 켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타
고집 있어 보이더라고. They looked really stubborn. 듣기 View video 키워드#보아 - my SMTelevision : [키워드#보아] Ep.78 오늘은 기범이가 요리사(2)

examples.korean: She can be as stubborn as a mule. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 지독하게 고집을 부리기도[고집불통이 되기도] 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She can be as stubborn as a mule. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: her obstinate refusal to comply with their request 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 요청에 응하지 않으려는 그녀의 고집 센 거부 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: her obstinate refusal to comply with their request Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Why are you so insistent that we leave tonight? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 어째서 우리가 오늘 밤에 떠나야 한다고 그렇게 고집하는 거니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why are you so insistent that we leave tonight? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was her sheer persistence that wore them down in the end. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 결국 그들이 무너진 것은 그녀의 순전한 고집 때문이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was her sheer persistence that wore them down in the end. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our buyers insist on high standards of workmanship and materials. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 구매자들은 높은 수준의 솜씨와 재료를 고집한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our buyers insist on high standards of workmanship and materials. Add to Wordbook
